comments.body: Why skip Windows? I know one needs something like `colorama` as well, but shouldn't this still work on Windows?

I was basing that decision on the following issue that seems to indicate that running on windows isn't going to work:

https://github.com/erikrose/blessings/issues/21

Also:

https://github.com/erikrose/blessings/blob/master/setup.py#L37

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +14,18 @@build:
  number: 0
  skip: True  # [win]
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt
